page.title: 02A Day In The Life Of.....
page.content: First of all in the morning I get up, wash, dress and go down stairs to eat my breakfast.After that I switch on my{computer}and play games on it for about one and a half hours.Then I go round for my friend Steven and we copy{computer games}from my friends. By lunch time we have finished our recording and we play the new games until about 3.30 in the afternoon,our favourite game has a helicopter in it where you have to blow up a nuclear reactor and land on a ship.But usually we play Ghostbusters where you have to capture lots of ghosts for money. Steven usually goes home after tea and I settle down to an evening watching the television.
